uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.stepHandlers
Class OmfStorageHandler

java.lang.Object
  uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.StorageHandler
      uni.hamburg.yamms.solver.stepHandlers.OmfStorageHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
StepHandler
public class OmfStorageHandler
extends StorageHandler

Standard storage handler for magnetization snapshots in the OMF format (the format used by the OOMMF micromagnetic solver)

The files are written in a defined directory. They are numbered consecutively and have a configurable prefix. By now only the ASCII format is supported

Author:
Claas Abert
